=template
## Run  c{copies}b{ber}  for  {family}/{specific}/
## Generated file; do not edit.
# This comment should be removed.

# Command to go at the top of each instruction file.  
python main.py {{family}} {{specific}} {{length}} {{seed}} --ncopies={{copies}} --ber={{berm}} --audit=10000 --shortlog=Y {{extra1}} {{extra2}} {{extra3}} >  {{family}}/{{specific}}/logb{{berid}}/c{{copies}}b{{berid}}s{{seed}}.log  2>&1  &

# Each file will contain the above command line and all these individual instruction lines.  
family,specific,length,seed,copies,berid,berm,extra1,extra2,extra3 
{family},{specific},0,{s1},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
{family},{specific},0,{s2},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
{family},{specific},0,{s3},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
{family},{specific},0,{s4},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
{family},{specific},0,{s5},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
{family},{specific},0,{s6},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
{family},{specific},0,{s7},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
{family},{specific},0,{s8},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
{family},{specific},0,{s9},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
{family},{specific},0,{s10},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},
{family},{specific},0,{s11},{copies},{ber},{ber}000,{extra1},{extra2},{extra3},

# Generates one instruction file for each line of parameters.  
# Each file contains the entire template with substitutions.  
=parameters
filename,copies,ber,family,specific,extra1,extra2,extra3,s1,s2,s3,s4,s5,s6,s7,s8,s9,s10,s11,s12,s13,s14,s15,s16,s17,s18,s19,s20,s21
